1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah and I would take a bath from a single vessel

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ وَالْمَرْأَةِ يَغْتَسِلاَنِ مِنْ إِنَاءٍ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: A man and woman taking bath from a single vessel
